00030 int AnalysePulseIsland::ProcessEntry(TGlobalData *gData, TSetupData *gSetup){
00031   typedef map<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> > TStringPulseIslandMap;
00032   typedef pair<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> > TStringPulseIslandPair;
00033   typedef map<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> >::iterator map_iterator;
00034 
00035    //std::cout << "Size of gData " << gData->fPulseIslandToChannelMap.size() << std::endl;
00036   for(map_iterator mapIter = gData->fPulseIslandToChannelMap.begin(); mapIter != gData->fPulseIslandToChannelMap.end(); mapIter++){
00037     pulse_counter = 0;
00038     std::string bankname = mapIter->first;
00039     std::string detname = gSetup->GetDetectorName(bankname);
00040     std::vector<TPulseIsland*> thePulses = mapIter->second;
00041     //std::cout<<"Analysing detector: "<<detname<<std::endl;
00042 
00043     if (thePulses.size() == 0)
00044       continue; // no pulses here...
00045 
00046     // Loop over the TPulseIslands and analyse the TPulseIslands into TAnalysedPulses
00047     std::vector<TAnalysedPulse*> analysedPulses;
00048 
00049     for (std::vector<TPulseIsland*>::iterator pulseIter = thePulses.begin(); pulseIter != thePulses.end(); pulseIter++) {
00050 
00051       // For the time being assume one TAnalysedPulse per TPulseIsland
00052       double amplitude = 0;
00053       double time = 0;
00054       double integral = 0;
00055       double energy = 0.;
00056 
00057       // Find all the pulses on the island first...
00058       //      std::vector<TPulseIsland*> allPulses = FindPulses(*pulseIter);
00059       //      std::cout << "Number of Pulses for " << detname << " on this Island: " << allPulses.size() << std::endl;
00060       // Now loop through all these pulses and create TAnalysedPulses
00061       //      for (std::vector<TPulseIsland*>::iterator allPulseIter = allPulses.begin(); allPulseIter != allPulses.end(); ++allPulseIter) {
00062 
00063         // If this is a slow pulse
00064         if ( TSetupData::IsSlow(detname) ) {
00065           GetAllParameters_MaxBin( gSetup, *pulseIter, amplitude, time, integral, energy);
00066         } else if ( TSetupData::IsFast(detname)) {
00067           GetAllParameters_MaxBin( gSetup, *pulseIter, amplitude, time, integral, energy);
00068         } else {
00069           GetAllParameters_MaxBin( gSetup, *pulseIter, amplitude, time, integral, energy);
00070         }
00071 
00072 
00073         TAnalysedPulse* analysedPulse = new TAnalysedPulse(amplitude, time, integral, energy, detname);
00074         analysedPulses.push_back(analysedPulse);
00075         //      }
00076     }    
00077     std::sort(analysedPulses.begin(), analysedPulses.end(), IsTimeOrdered);
00078     gAnalysedPulseMap[detname] = analysedPulses;
00079   }
00080 
00081   return 0;
00082 }
00083 
00084 // GetAllParameters_MaxBin()
00085 // -- Gets all the parameters for the pulse using the max bin method
00086 void AnalysePulseIsland::GetAllParameters_MaxBin(TSetupData* gSetup, const TPulseIsland* pulse,
00087                                                  double& amplitude, double& time, double& integral, double& energy) {
00088 
00089   std::string bankname = pulse->GetBankName();
00090   double pedestal = gSetup->GetPedestal(bankname);
00091   int trigger_polarity = gSetup->GetTriggerPolarity(bankname);
00092   double eCalib_slope = gSetup->GetADCSlopeCalib(bankname);
00093   double eCalib_offset = gSetup->GetADCOffsetCalib(bankname);
00094 
00095   // First find the position of the peak
00096   std::vector<int> pulseSamples = pulse->GetSamples();
00097   int peak_sample_value = 0;
00098   int peak_sample_pos = 0;
00099   for (std::vector<int>::const_iterator sampleIter = pulseSamples.begin(); sampleIter != pulseSamples.end(); sampleIter++) {
00100     
00101     int this_height = trigger_polarity*(*(sampleIter) - pedestal);
00102     if ( this_height > peak_sample_value ) {
00103       peak_sample_value = this_height;
00104       peak_sample_pos = sampleIter - pulseSamples.begin();
00105     }
00106   }
00107 
00108   // Now assign the parameters
00109   amplitude = peak_sample_value;
00110   time = ((pulse->GetTimeStamp() + peak_sample_pos) * gSetup->GetClockTick(bankname)) - gSetup->GetTimeShift(bankname);
00111   integral = 0;
00112   energy = eCalib_slope * amplitude + eCalib_offset;
00113 }
00114 
00115 // IsTimeOrdered()
00116 // -- Returns tru of the first pulse is before the second
00117 bool IsTimeOrdered(TAnalysedPulse* a, TAnalysedPulse* b) {
00118 
00119   // Want a to be before b
00120   return ( a->GetTime() < b->GetTime() );
00121 
00122 }

00124 // FindPulses()
00125 // -- Finds all pulses on an island and returns the vector of sub pulses
00126 std::vector<TPulseIsland*> AnalysePulseIsland::FindPulses(TPulseIsland* theIsland) {
00127 
00128   // Get the output ready
00129   std::vector<TPulseIsland*> output;
00130 
00131   // Things we need from the oldpulse island
00132   std::string bankname = theIsland->GetBankName();
00133   std::vector<int> theSamples = theIsland->GetSamples();
00134   int pedestal = TSetupData::Instance()->GetPedestal(bankname);
00135   int trigger_polarity = TSetupData::Instance()->GetTriggerPolarity(bankname);
00136   int RMS = 20; // hard-coded for the time being
00137 
00138   // Histograms
00139   std::stringstream histname;
00140   histname << bankname << "new_pulses_" << pulse_counter;
00141   ++pulse_counter;
00142   //  TH1F* new_pulses = new TH1F(histname.str().c_str(), histname.str().c_str(), theSamples.size(),0,theSamples.size());
00143   histname << "_old";
00144   //  TH1F* old_pulse = new TH1F(histname.str().c_str(), histname.str().c_str(), theSamples.size(),0,theSamples.size());
00145 
00146   // What we need for the new pulses
00147   int timestamp = 0;
00148   std::vector<int> newSamples;
00149 
00150   // Loop through the samples
00151   bool start_pulse = false;
00152   for (std::vector<int>::iterator sampleIter = theSamples.begin(); sampleIter != theSamples.end(); ++sampleIter) {
00153   
00154     // Get the current height (taking into account pulse polarity)
00155     int height = trigger_polarity*(*(sampleIter) - pedestal);
00156     //    old_pulse->Fill(sampleIter - theSamples.begin(), *sampleIter);
00157 
00158     if (start_pulse == false) { // if we haven't found a pulse yet then see if we do
00159       if (height > 0 + RMS) {
00160         timestamp = sampleIter - theSamples.begin();
00161         start_pulse = true;
00162       }
00163     }
00164 
00165     if (start_pulse == true) {
00166       // see if the pulse has ended
00167       if (height < 0) {
00168         start_pulse = false; // the pulse is over
00169 
00170         // Add the TPulseIsland
00171         output.push_back(new TPulseIsland(timestamp, newSamples, bankname));
00172 
00173         // Clear the old information
00174         newSamples.clear();
00175         timestamp = 0;
00176       }
00177       else {
00178         newSamples.push_back(*sampleIter);
00179         //      new_pulses->Fill(sampleIter - theSamples.begin(), *sampleIter);
00180       }
00181     }
00182   }
00183 
00184   return output;
00185 }
